newsitem.title: USA: CUC International enters Microsoft alliance.
newsitem.headline: CUC International enters Microsoft alliance.

text.p: CUC International Inc said Monday one of its divisions would be in charge of sales for local advertisements on Cityscape, Microsoft Corp's online city entertainment guides.
The company said it had formed an alliance with Microsoft in which its Entertainment Publications division would be the sales organization for the guides.
Cityscape will feature information about movies, restaurants, music, arts and local entertainment events, it said.
The first city guide will debut in Seattle during the first quarter of calendar 1997, it added.
CUC International Inc is a membership services company that provides consumers with access to services such as home shopping, dining and travel.
